name: solo
description: Solopreneur OS. Manage clients, create content, track revenue, build products, and qualify leads with scored diagnostics — from discovery to validated design. Built on PARA methodology.

core-identity.description: Business identity foundations — profile, voice, ICP, positioning, and file organisation. Always pre-loaded.

client-work.description: Full client lifecycle — onboarding, discovery, proposals, scope management, and contracts.

revenue-ops.description: Financial operations — invoicing, expenses, financial health, retainers, and pricing.

sales-growth.description: Lead generation and sales — pipeline, outreach, company research, competitive analysis, and landing pages.

product-build.description: Product development — orchestration, PRDs, user stories, design briefs, problem statements, and personas.

research-validate.description: Market research and validation — user discovery, market sizing, journey mapping, and idea testing.

diagnostics.description: Scored diagnostic assessments — build, run, and analyze diagnostics with Tally integration.

operations.description: Business operations — weekly reviews, project management, capacity planning, health advisors, and launch planning.
